title: Silver jubilee edition of Bengaluru Tech Summit from November 16-18 - Business Standard
content:
1. Silver jubilee edition of Bengaluru Tech Summit from November 16-18  Business Standard

description: The Chief Minister today chaired a meeting over breakfast with a number of CEOs and leaders from the fields of electronics, IT, biotech, and startups here
